wms_article.title: LG Electronics continues supporting vocational training in Ethiopia, Cambodia

wms_article_body.body: LG Electronics is continuing its efforts to help young people achieve economic independence by providing vocational training in countries including Ethiopia and Cambodia. In partnership with the Korea International Cooperation Agency (KOICA) and the Ethiopian government, LG announced on Monday that it held the ninth graduation ceremony at the â€œLG-KOICA Hope Vocational Schoolâ€ in Ethiopia on August 9th, 2025 (local time), producing 70 new graduates. The school has graduated a total of 611 students since its founding in 2014. The LG-KOICA Hope Vocational School was established in 2014 through a partnership among LG, KOICA, and the Ethiopian government as a technical training institution.
